DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Pea aphid parasitism assays & Praon pequodorum fitness assay
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Tab 1: parasitism assay data from each aphid line showing aphid survival, mummification, and mortality out of 20 aphids per replicate. Also shows H. defensa and APSE infection status. Tab 2: Praon pequodorum fitness assays, showing fitness data (tibial length and dry weight) for both males and females that emerged from resistant and non-resistant aphids.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: competition
specialization
coevolution
resistance
symbiosis
